div.a: Assistant Principal/Director of Curriculum and Instruction

span.font: After careful and thoughtful consideration regarding the current situation with COVID-19, the Spring Lake Heights School District will be moving forward with our closure plan effective Monday, March 16th.

b.font: "FOLLOW" us to be sure you are always in the loop on all district news,

div.font: Click the image above to learn more about

font.a: Monmouth County Health Department Immunization Press Release
Hand Foot and Mouth Disease Information
Application for Vote by Mail Ballot

span.b: Official report issued by the New Jersey Department of Education.

font.span: Please take advantage of the official Spring Lake Heights School District App. Yet another way to stay informed on all things going on in our school. It is available for both iPhone and Android devices.

span.font: The mission of the Spring Lake Heights School District, in partnership with a small, supportive community, is to educate children through academic excellence, ensuring that all students meet or exceed the New Jersey Core Curriculum Content Standards, empowering them to achieve their optimal potential as life-learners and productive, responsible citizens.

p.span: 1110 Highway 71, Spring Lake Heights, New Jersey 07762
